captions.text: If you're saying hi
because I look down
Don't worry about hurting my feelings
Just pass me by
Don't worry about hurting my feelings
I'm fine, really
I might look sick, but still
I have so much I want to say
I end up blah blah blabbering by myself
I don't like you, really
In fact, I hate you, despise you
Every night, in my bed alone
I hug my blanket and it's cold
If you're approaching
because you feel sorry
Don't worry about hurting my feelings
Just pass me by
The coldest things you say with no intentions
I hurt over them secretly, as if it was intended
It's not going to work obviously, I know
Pity, I don't even ask for anymore
I don't want to look small
So I got up and left first
So don't you hesitate, I'm really okay
Just don't say anything, turn around and go
Don't worry about hurting my feelings
Just pass me by
Pass me by

Just
Zion.T & Crush

comments.text:
Hey everyone! Just in case if you did not know the Amoeba Culture will be 
bringing their biggest artists to Atlanta and New York City for concerts 
this March.
Produced by Music Enkor, the showcases will take place on March 27 and 28, 
respectively, and will feature performances by Dynamic Duo, Crush, Zion.T, 
and Primary! So if you are in the ATL PLEAS come out and show the love so 
we can have more of are favorite Korean artist come out okay! ^w^/ ﻿
